sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 飞机终于降落在陆地上了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fēijī zhōngyú jiàngluò zài lùdì shàng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'avion a enfin atterri sur la terre ferme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The plane finally landed on the ground.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège dàizi shì sùliào zuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce sac est fait en plastique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bag is made of plastic.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de péngyou shì yī míng lǜshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon ami est avocat.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My friend is a lawyer.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请给我一条干净的毛巾。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī tiáo gānjìng de máojīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi une serviette propre, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a clean towel.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zuòzhe lúnyǐ cānjiā bǐsài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il participe à la compétition en fauteuil roulant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He participates in the competition in a wheelchair.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhèngzài xiě bìyè lùnwén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en train d'écrire son mémoire de fin d'études.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is writing his graduation thesis.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 昨晚我做了一个奇怪的梦。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuówǎn wǒ zuò le yī gè qíguài de mèng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai fait un rêve étrange hier soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I had a strange dream last night.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Méicuò, jiùshì zhèyàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est exact, c'est bien ça.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That's right, exactly like this.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天太阳很大，戴上帽子吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān tàiyáng hěn dà, dàishang màozi ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil est fort aujourd'hui, mets un chapeau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun is strong today, put on a hat.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài gōngsī de dìwèi hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a une position élevée dans l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a high position in the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shuō Yīngyǔ fēicháng liúlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle parle anglais très couramment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She speaks English very fluently.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng tiánxiě nín de xìngbié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez indiquer votre sexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please fill in your gender.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de mèngxiǎng shì huányóu shìjiè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon rêve est de faire le tour du monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My dream is to travel around the world.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ huáiyí tā shuō de huà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je doute de ce qu'il dit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I doubt what he said.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen zhījiān de mìmì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un secret entre nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a secret between us.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mìshū bāng wǒ ānpái le huìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La secrétaire m'a organisé une réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The secretary arranged a meeting for me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīngjù shì Zhōngguó chuántǒng yìshù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'opéra de Pékin est un art traditionnel chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Peking Opera is a traditional Chinese art.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng shūrù nín de mìmǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez entrer votre mot de passe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please enter your password.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shōurù hěn wěndìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son revenu est très stable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His income is very stable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen de guānxi fēicháng mìqiè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Leur relation est très étroite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Their relationship is very close.
